review: Very Happy with the product. Awesome and easy to setup. My 10 year old was able to complete the whole setup in less than 15 mins. I would recommend this as a buy for everyone for its excellent content.
author: Supratim De

review: So much easier to use than the google chromecast. The remote makes all the difference.
author: Erin

review: So far, so good.  Just had it a few days and I do like it and its capabilities.  As time goes on and we do more with it, I may have to go up to 5 stars.  Thanks.
author: Sue

review: It was a fair fight, but very one-sided. Hope Chomey doesn't get too lonesome plugged into the set in the basement that no one in the family watches.
author: jmartin18rdb

review: Good product, wish newer movies were offered under prime, or pay a bit more for prime and get new release movie rental for free.
author: brock mearig

review: This is the easiest thing I have ever hooked up.  Basically plug it in and you are live watching tv.
author: Craig Richter "Squintz"

review: Love the fire stick.  So easy to use.  As good as having a "smart" TV.
author: Joann Rosenbaum
